summary: This code prints a greeting message, prompts the user to input their lucky number and then reaffirms it as their lucky number.

details.comment: This code prints a greeting message, prompts the user to input their lucky number and then reaffirms it as their lucky number.
details.content:
print("hello WORLD!!!!")
target = input("what is your lucky number?\n")
print(target, "is your lucky number!")
